scripts.benchmark: cd src & for /R %i in (*.benchmark.js) do echo. & echo %i & echo. & babel %i | node
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -d build && babel build -d lib --ignore *.*.js && cp package.json lib & cp README.md lib & cp LICENSE lib
scripts.deploy: npm run test && npm publish lib/
scripts.test: npm run build && tape build/**/*.spec.js | tap-spec
